__scriptAsset.tooltip: The script asset of the component. Tap to highlight the script in Assets panel

_atlas.tooltip: Atlas that the image belongs to

type.tooltip: Rendering Mode: Simple, Sliced, Tiled or Filled

fillType.tooltip: The direction of filling, choose from Horizontal, Vertical and Radial

fillCenter.tooltip: For radial filling, set the center of the circle, value range is 0 to 1

fillStart.tooltip: The normalized value indicates where to start filling

fillRange.tooltip: The normalizad value indicates how much of the sprite we want to show

trim.tooltip: Whether to render transparent pixels around image in node's bounding box. If you check this option the bounding box will not include transparent pixels around the image.

sizeMode.tooltip: Set the size of the node on which the Sprite component is on. CUSTOM for setting width and height manually;TRIMMED to use image size with transparent pixels trimmed; RAW to use image size without trimming.

__scriptAsset.tooltip: The script asset of the component. Tap to highlight the script in Assets panel
